titleStmt.title: De ventre inspiciendo: or, Remarks on Mr. Ashton's answerer in a letter to a friend.
titleStmt.author: Ashton, John, d. 1691.

notesStmt.note: Written by John Ashton. Cf. Wing
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Dated at foot of p. 4: April 5. 1691.
Reproduction of the original in the University of Texas, Austin Library.
